metadata.title: GitLab
metadata.intro: A visual cheat-sheet for the 58 keyboard shortcuts found in GitLab

cards.title: Global
cards.body:
| Shortcut           | Action                                                                   |
| ------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `?`                | Show or hide the shortcut reference sheet                                |
| `Shift` `P`        | Go to your projects page                                                 |
| `Shift` `G`        | Go to your groups page                                                   |
| `Shift` `A`        | Go to your activity page                                                 |
| `Shift` `L`        | Go to your milestones page                                               |
| `Shift` `S`        | Go to your snippets page                                                 |
| `S`                | Put the cursor in the issues or merge requests search                    |
| `Shift` `I`        | Go to your issues page                                                   |
| `Shift` `T`        | Go to your merge requests page                                           |
| `P` `B`            | Show or hide the performance bar                                         |
| `Up`               | Edit your last comment, you must be in a blank text field below a thread |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `P` | Toggle markdown preview when editing text in a text field                |

{.shortcuts}

shortcuts.action: Show or hide the shortcut reference sheet
Go to your projects page
Go to your groups page
Go to your activity page
Go to your milestones page
Go to your snippets page
Put the cursor in the issues or merge requests search
Go to your issues page
Go to your merge requests page
Show or hide the performance bar
Edit your last comment, you must be in a blank text field below a thread
Toggle markdown preview when editing text in a text field

cards.title: Project
cards.body:
| Shortcut | Action                                                |
| -------- | ----------------------------------------------------- |
| `G` `P`  | Go to the project home page                           |
| `G` `V`  | Go to the project activity feed                       |
| `G` `R`  | Go to the project releases list                       |
| `G` `F`  | Go to the project files list                          |
| `T`      | Go to the project file search page                    |
| `G` `C`  | Go to the project commits list                        |
| `G` `N`  | Go to the repository graph page                       |
| `G` `D`  | Go to the repository charts                           |
| `G` `I`  | Go to the project issues list                         |
| `I`      | Go to the new issue page                              |
| `G` `B`  | Go to the project issues boards list                  |
| `G` `M`  | Go to the project merge requests list                 |
| `G` `J`  | Go to the CI/CD jobs list                             |
| `G` `L`  | Go to the project metrics                             |
| `G` `E`  | Go to the project environments                        |
| `G` `K`  | Go to the project Kubernetes cluster integration page |
| `G` `S`  | Go to the project snippets list                       |
| `G` `W`  | Go to the project wiki, if enabled                    |

{.shortcuts}

shortcuts.action: Go to the project home page
Go to the project activity feed
Go to the project releases list
Go to the project files list
Go to the project file search page
Go to the project commits list
Go to the repository graph page
Go to the repository charts
Go to the project issues list
Go to the new issue page
Go to the project issues boards list
Go to the project merge requests list
Go to the CI/CD jobs list
Go to the project metrics
Go to the project environments
Go to the project Kubernetes cluster integration page
Go to the project snippets list
Go to the project wiki, if enabled

cards.title: Issues and Merge Requests
cards.body:
| Shortcut | Action                                                             |
| -------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `E`      | Edit description                                                   |
| `A`      | Change assignee                                                    |
| `M`      | Change milestone                                                   |
| `L`      | Change label                                                       |
| `R`      | Start writing a comment, if any text is selected it will be quoted |
| `N`      | Move to next unresolved discussion, merge requests only            |
| `P`      | Move to previous unresolved discussion, merge requests only        |
| `]`      | Move to next file, merge requests only                             |
| `[`      | Move to previous file, merge requests only                         |

{.shortcuts}

shortcuts.action: Edit description
Change assignee
Change milestone
Change label
Start writing a comment, if any text is selected it will be quoted
Move to next unresolved discussion, merge requests only
Move to previous unresolved discussion, merge requests only
Move to next file, merge requests only
Move to previous file, merge requests only

cards.title: Project Files
cards.body:
| Shortcut | Action                                                      |
| -------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- |
| `Up`     | Move selection up                                           |
| `Down`   | Move selection down                                         |
| `Enter`  | Open selection                                              |
| `Esc`    | Go back to file list screen, only while searching for files |
| `Y`      | Go to file permalink, only while viewing a file             |

{.shortcuts}

shortcuts.action: Move selection up
Move selection down
Open selection
Go back to file list screen, only while searching for files
Go to file permalink, only while viewing a file

cards.title: Web IDE
cards.body:
| Shortcut       | Action                                              |
| -------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| `Ctrl` `P`     | Search for, and then open, another file for editing |
| `Ctrl` `Enter` | Commit, when editing the commit message             |

{.shortcuts}

shortcuts.action: Search for, and then open, another file for editing
Commit, when editing the commit message

cards.title: Repository Graph
cards.body:
| Shortcut       | Action           |
| -------------- | ---------------- |
| `Left`         | Scroll left      |
| `Right`        | Scroll right     |
| `Up`           | Scroll up        |
| `Down`         | Scroll down      |
| `Shift` `Up`   | Scroll to top    |
| `Shift` `Down` | Scroll to bottom |

{.shortcuts}

shortcuts.action: Scroll left
Scroll right
Scroll up
Scroll down
Scroll to top
Scroll to bottom
Edit wiki page

cards.title: Filtered Search
cards.body:
| Shortcut           | Action                     |
| ------------------ | -------------------------- |
| `Ctrl` `Backspace` | Clear entire search filter |
| `Alt` `Backspace`  | Clear one token at a time  |

{.shortcuts}

shortcuts.action: Clear entire search filter
Clear one token at a time

cards.title: Epics
cards.body:
| Shortcut | Action                                                             |
| -------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `R`      | Start writing a comment, if any text is selected it will be quoted |
| `E`      | Edit description                                                   |
| `L`      | Change a label                                                     |

{.shortcuts}

shortcuts.action: Start writing a comment, if any text is selected it will be quoted
Edit description
Change a label
